mapper.select: select dict.parent_code parentCode, dict.name, dict.dict_value dictValue from dict dict where dict.parent_code in ('significance','callonProgress','recordMissing');

SELECT tt.dict_code dictCode, tt.name, tt.dict_value dictValue FROM( SELECT case #{meetingType} WHEN 'meetingType:1' THEN 'meeting1Result' WHEN 'meetingType:3' THEN 'meeting3Result' WHEN 'meetingType:4' THEN 'meeting4Result' WHEN 'meetingType:5' THEN 'meeting5Result' else 'meetingResult' end meetingType, parent_code, dict_code, name, dict_value FROM dict ) tt WHERE tt.parent_code=tt.meetingType

SELECT tt.dict_code dictCode, tt.name, tt.dict_value dictValue FROM( SELECT case WHEN #{meetingResult} in('meetingResult:3','meeting3Result:6','meeting5Result:2','meeting1Result:4','meeting4Result:3') THEN 'meetingVetoReason' WHEN #{meetingResult} in('meetingResult:2') THEN 'meetingUndeterminedReason' WHEN #{meetingResult} in('meeting5Result:1') THEN 'meetingFollowingReason' else '' end resultReason, parent_code, dict_code, name, dict_value FROM dict) tt WHERE tt.parent_code=tt.resultReason;

SELECT id,name name,dict_value dictValue,dict_code dictCode,dict_sort dictSort, is_delete isDelete,parent_code parentCode,text text FROM dict WHERE parent_code = #{parentCode} AND is_delete = 0 ORDER BY dict_sort ASC
